title.narrative: Cooperative Threat Reduction Program: Cooperative Biological Engagement [non-ODA]

description.narrative: Cooperative Biological Engagement Program (CBEP) - objectives are to cooperatively assist partner nation governments in addressing obligations assumed by signing the United Nations National Security Council Resolution 1540, to prevent the proliferation of nuclear, chemical and biological weapons, and their means of delivery, including by establishing appropriate controls over related materials.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Azerbaijan - Southern Boarder Security Program

description.narrative: To conduct or support programs providing training and equipment to national security forces of foreign countries for the purpose of building capacity of partner nations. The Defense Security Cooperation Agency (DSCA) provides program management. Country teams work through DoD geographic Combatant Commands (COCOMs).

title.narrative: U.S. Department of Defense, Institutional Capacity Building Programs: Wales Initiative Fund activities, events, and exercises

description.narrative: Azerbaijan - Advanced Energy Security and Resilience Workshop. This event will consist of a one-week workshop held in Baku, Azerbaijan that will include an information exchange and breakout group discussions on energy security, responses to energy crises (man-made and adversary hybrid attacks), and interagency/regional coordination and cooperation.
